attributes.action: demand that the BBC reinstates Moira Stuart as a front line newscaster in line with age discrimination legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been reported that Moira Stuart has been shelved from Sunday news presentation to make place for younger newscasters.

This is a contravention of age discrimination legislation and must be overturned immediately.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
